sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import './Message.css' const Message = ({ type }) => { const messages = { saved: 'Welcome New Player!', updated: 'Player information updated.', deleted: 'Player deleted.', mismatched: 'Email confirmation must match.', improperlyNamed: 'Name must be 3 to 15 characters.', improperlyPassworded: 'Password must be 6 to 15 characters.', improperlyEmailed: 'Must be a valid email.', invalidCredentialed: 'Invalid Credentials.', signupFailed: 'Sign up failure.', logoutFailed: 'Log out failure.' } return (

{messages[type]}

) } export default Message;
